title: Need helpful suggestions for customizing "certain" type
content:
First of all I know in the past people have been hounding other people with questions about the MPAA rating letterforms, but my situation is a little different.

While I know these types are varied and possibly illustrated by hand, I'm trying to create a simple piece of art mimicing the movie rating system but need to have a another letter(s) to come close as I can to the "feel" of the other already rendered by the MPAA.

I've tried narrowing down a few fonts (ie; Latino Black, Melior Std Bold, Clarendon Std Bold and Egypienne Std Blk) that could come close or if need be modified to my liking but was wondering if any have further suggestions I could look for. Thanks in advance.
author: drnwrkr

comments.content:
Hi, James

So bizarre I thought I had commented in this thread. I think at one point I had this same question. I ended up finding the logos online somewhere so didn't have to re-build them. But, IIRC I was just going to use Melior.

Here is one link:http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/categories/movies/132046.html  
But this isn't where I found it.
